navigation._comment: You can also use the word 'Account' if it fits better in your language

timeline.noneFollowing: Kalau Anda ingin menggunakan tab Mengikuti, Anda harus Mengikuti seseorang terlebih dahulu üòù

details._comment: I don't know the context of this one, as I've not used chirp in months, just visit every once in a while to see progress. This might need a little retuning.

messages.noMessagesText:
Sepertinya, Anda tidak memiliki pesan!
Mengapa anda tidak coba berinteraksi dengan seseorang?

sideBar.highTraffic:
Kami sedang mengalami lalu lintas yang sangat tinggi saat ini.
Chirpie sedang berusaha semaksimal mungkin, tetapi kalau Chirp mulai melambat, jangan panik!

buttons._comment: This is a verb. Example: _Chirp_ this. Do not translate it to the sound a bird makes.
This is a verb. Example: _Like_ this post
This is a verb. Example: _Rechirp_ this post
This is a verb. Example: _Reply_ to this tweet
Might need a little fix, since I'm not sure about this one either.
